thread.title: Louisiana National Guard Museum plans Desert Storm exhibit
thread.title_full: Louisiana National Guard Museum plans Desert Storm exhibit - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Louisiana National Guard Museum plans Desert Storm exhibit
text:
NEW ORLEANS (AP) - The Louisiana National Guard Museum at Jackson Barracks in New Orleans is preparing an exhibit to mark the 25th Anniversary of Operation Desert Storm.
The Guard plans to open the exhibit in February. In preparation, Guard officials are publicly seeking videos, photos and artifacts that can be used to help tell the story of the Louisiana National Guard's participation in Desert Storm and related operations.
National Guard museum officials also are looking for people who served in Desert Storm for interviews.
Online:
Louisiana National Guard site:
http://geauxguard.la.gov/
Information exhibit on Guard museum Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/geauxguardmuseums
